reviews.review: I honestly really enjoy this game and the killers that come out even if they arent the best. I feel like everyone can be accommodated with different perks, killers, and addons and theres a killer for everyone.
I like this game. A lot.

Bought this game as i saw a couple of friends playing it. Never looked at it before but wish i had, a lot of characters to choose from, lots of perks and surprisingly addictive gameplay. Would highly recommend especially if playing with a few friends.

Buenardo juego pero es mas ameno con amigos de supeviviente o personalisadas, en pocas palabras el echo de aprender cosas nuevas e ir progresando y aprendiendo premia mucho (miren guias compaÃ±eros conccha su madre :)

Creo que el juego necesita prÃ¡ctica.

This game is weighted so heavily for survivors, the game has no voice chat but then people will just go around that and use discord. Which defeats the point of anything. The idea of ratings is a joke, because it has no hold on gameplay. You a low rank killer? Enjoy playing with rank 6 survivors. This is the shit that had me stop 5 years ago, and I was stupid enough to give the devs props for "coming further with the game"
Do you know what has changed? The killer can close the hatch, and downed survivors can crawl to safety. There's also now a battle pass progression system, to inspire fear of missing out. You can cross perk with survivors to become undetectable, and SOMEHOW when I play survivor and run in a straight line I am always caught, but when I'm the killer I can't catch up to anyone. I don't care enough to keep playing this game to have to master it's every minute detail, which seems to be what every single person I get to play against as a killer has done and the idea of watching someone playing this game to learn the nuisances when it has a tutorial, means the tutorial is a waste of time BUT ALSO HEY, THEY KNOW THE TUTORIAL IS A PIECE OF SHIT, AND BAIT YOU TO DO IT ANYWAY TO UNLOCK CHARACTERS, GET BLOOD POINTS, AND GET COSMETICS.
Or you get to play with trolls. Don't believe the 5 year hype. This game is just as confusing and muddled down as it was before. If you do play then don't bother being a killer, because it's gameplay is basically, get kited around the map and maybe hit someone. The only killers that are fun are the trapper and the hillbilly, and they basically need purple tier upgrades to be useful and not be a joke. Every killer in this game is a joke, and it's not a scary game. It's a stressful game, so do you like being stressed when you play a game? Then enjoy this.

I actually cannot properly explain to you how bad this game is. It's so bad that people have positive reviews toting the worst negatives of the game. "Hey steam is easily abused, so we'll abuse it to bring others in for our entertainment to abuse!" Because after all, most people just look at the percentage and what it says it's reviewed at.

Played a $h1t ton on xbox, was a proud doctor main. Turns out I have to pay for doctor on PC but I'm 9 hours in and already spent an extra $10 on new characters. I recommend playing survivor if your friends have DBD, but if not, play killer. If you're interested in a survivor/killer character, check No0b3 and Monto's Youtube channels to see how the character holds up in a game. Heads up: check to see if a killer you want has gotten nerfed before you buy them. I bought legion without realizing that he took a massive blow a year ago. His ability is practically useless now besides just simply stopping survivors from looping you. Overall, very worth game, would recommend.
pyramid head sexeyyyyyy hahaa omg dont send me to the cage sir you're so cuteee lol
Bad. Not fun. Imbalanced. Real-money cash shop. Excessive DLC. What more do i need to say.
this game either makes you piss yourself laughing or cry yourself to sleep

this game is very bad, i love it

I bought this game about more than a year ago
Its good game in surviving genre but it still has many bugs after 5 years.
most of the DLCs are fine but there are 3 problems in DLC :
1-Im huge fan of Ash Williams but the perks that Ash have in this game are trash
and there is no killer for Ash (I mean it could be "Baal" or a deadite)
you pay for 2 characters but there is just one
(Oh and btw there is no map also :) )
2-Trickster is OP in this game and its not even scary as the rest of the killers
I mean look at all killers in game and look at trickster :/
he is like a Kitty among Tigers
3-the DLCs and the skins are a bit Expensive and few of them worth their price
but the good point is Bill :D
he is free with good perks but he have only 4 extra skins except the prestige ones
the rest of the survivors are fine 
Hope they fix the bugs soon and lower a bit the prices :)
Sincerely KILLER
a fun game that even though i have to grind again im still having fun
